extendedInfo.description: See the latest fashion outfits from around the world, and instantly find where to buy them!â â â â â Featured in top fashion blogs like the LA Times, The Guardian, WWD and more, Kaleidoscope is the newest and most fun way to shop for fashion. Itâs like a combination of Pinterest and Shopstyle.â Inspiring images from street style, fashion blogging, celebrities, fashion editors, fashion shows and runway looksâ Browse outfits, save your favoritesâ Share on Pinterest, Twitter and Facebookâ Like something you see? With one click, see tons of similar items and where to buy them!â Find items that are on sale, and the stores with the cheapest optionsâ Everything from dresses, skirts, tops, shirts, pants, blouses, jeans, shorts, coats, jackets, heels, wedges, sandals, sunglasses, necklaces, bracelets, rings, bags, clutches and more!â FASHION WEEK DAILY::âKaleidoscope allows you to finally shop all those fabulous street style looks you've been Pinterest-ing and Tumbl-ing, with smart phone-enabled easeââ THE HIGH LOW:âIf youâve ever wanted to click on, say, a Sartorialist photograph and buy everything the subject was wearing, Kaleidoscope was created just for youââ â â â â âLove it!!! Have great up to date style!! Have to have app!! Very happy with it!ââ â â â â âGreat app, beautiful images. One of the more impressive fashion apps I've seen lately!ââ â â â â âLove this app!! It is soo addicting for any girl loving hundreds of fashion ideas.ââ â â â â âReally great app with a good experience, I hate how I get caught at work using it! Too addicting.â

reviews.title: I Love It But
reviews.comment: I love this app and their are some great styles however could you please create a mens category as their are only a few men looks on this and they all are similar styles thanks :p
reviews.author: Ramez Rubbani

reviews.title: More functionality
reviews.comment: Good app but would like to see a filter option so I can quickly see male styles. Please introduce this.
reviews.author: Craig Birkbeck

reviews.title: Could be better
reviews.comment: I think a truly good fashion app would have different categories, like gender, season, age group, etc.
reviews.author: Trin Biccard

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: I couldn\'t even use it. It takes long to open and it\'s always freezing please fix it
reviews.author: Leila Diogo

reviews.title: Whaas Wrong ?
reviews.comment: Why does it keep saying there\'s no internet connection if my internet is working fine ?? idid like it while it was working though ..
reviews.author: Shaylonshe Vick

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: The interface is intuitive and attractive.  I only wish there were more mens clothes and a wider variety of men\'s styles. Other than those issues, it\'s great.
reviews.author: Toney Betton

reviews.title: only US supported
reviews.comment: would be better if could have more country stores and to select own location
reviews.author: Nicole Tan

reviews.title: LOST?!
reviews.comment: I download it, open it but it keeps saying No network connection, my network is working fine though -.- I really want to check this app out because it looks good if only it would work :(
reviews.author: Mini Oaicare

reviews.title: nyc
reviews.comment: i lik it..tis good to c al dos awesum outfits...luv d collectn!
reviews.author: Vriddhee Goel

reviews.title: Fab
reviews.comment: Really excellent app....real sense of fashion..... must download it.....
reviews.author: Zoya Chowdhary

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Love this! I love the shop this look feature. As other people wrote-please add a men\'s filter or make a men\'s app!
reviews.author: Rebecca Proznick

reviews.title: Not so bad
reviews.comment: It gets a bit annoying having to login every time I open the app. Also it would be nice to be able to save our place on the page if we ever wanted to go back and look at designs from a specific spot. I have to give the app credit for its ability to find similar designs, and the styles provided have been right up my alley.
reviews.author: Danielle Jappah

reviews.title: Great, just one thing.
reviews.comment: i love the app, styles are great and stores a perf. but overtime i click the app i have to login. it would be nice if it would remember me or only ask when something with my phone happens... login sucks, please try to fix it.
reviews.author: Alexia Makowski

reviews.title: Perfect
reviews.comment: One of the best, most perfect, apps I have ever seen. Only thing that could be better is the app logo. Just use the pretty octagon.
reviews.author: Maarten Hoedjes

reviews.title: Meh...
reviews.comment: The looks in this app at first can be inspiring. But after awhile it starts to get redundant and you notice the people start to look them same. I mean come on! You call this app fashion kaleidoscope! It should reflect the many colors of people, styles, sizes and fashion. You can do better!
reviews.author: Evitaa Evans

reviews.title: Love it but...
reviews.comment: Love the idea of the app. It definitely gives me inspiration but the \"Shop the look\" section is NEVER accurate. If I click on the girls gorgeous black booties it doesn\'t show the exact same pair it shows similar items which is very annoying. I\'m not sure if that has to do with the girls not posting the correct site or the app creators but it should be changed.
reviews.author: Shanae G

reviews.title: Good, needs fixed.
reviews.comment: This app is wonderful, I love it for insipration and to find the things I\'m looking for.  However, it could function better. When I tap on a \'look\' it will not pull up. I always get frustrated and exit the app. Please fix this, I don\'t want to delete it but I may have to.
reviews.author: Ally W.

reviews.title: Fun app with some kinks to work out
reviews.comment: I love the concept of the app and browsing through all the looks but it can definitely be improved upon by getting rid of the more major bugs. I\'ve had some issues with opening the images; sometimes I\'d have to press a look a bunch of times until it finally went through. This isn\'t a prob w/ the speed but w/ teh touch calibration. Another pesky issue is that the majority of the item links are broken. Im also having issues w/ the app not recognizing the network connection. Uninstalled and reinstalled.
reviews.author: Valerie Rozenbaum

reviews.title: I luuuuuv It
reviews.comment: Th\303\251 greatest fashion app.  I adore it
reviews.author: Samar Samy

reviews.title: sukhad
reviews.comment: this app suckz.....crashes everytym on my S3
reviews.author: sukhi koppikar
